summary: An large Mansion for those who want to try it in drug dealer style,with overhauled prices,effects and recipes.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc]This mod has goal to closen the gamer to the ilegal narcotics fenomena in the Skyrim.
[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc]It adds two labaratories which are designed to produce skooma and other narcotics.
Small one is located in your former room at college of Winterhold.[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc]
[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc]The Other is the major one,and is a part of Giovanni Mansion,which is located in South Falkreath Hold (check pcs).
[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc]On that mansion,which you own,you have Labaratory composed of three segments.
[i]1.Main Labaratory[/i] which produces narcotics,
also 2.[i]D[/i][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc][i]istillation Mechanism[/i] for [/color][color=#ffffff]Mead[/color][color=#cccccc] And [/color][color=#ffffff]Ale[/color][color=#cccccc] (Which Has Unique Bottle Mesh Now)
and 3.[i]Wine Production Unit.[/i] for [/color][color=#ffffff]Wine[/color][color=#cccccc].[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc]
[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc]You also have a small vineyard,and honey combs for mead,and if you [/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc]lack moon sugar you can buy it at at Riften Thieves Guild,at Alchemist Herluine Lothaire.
[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc]
[/color][/font][/size][font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc][size=4]
Following narcotics are craftable at[i] Main Lab[/i] :[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=3] [/size][/color][size=4][color=#ffffff]- Skooma
 - Double Distilled Skooma
 - Balmora Blue
 - Moonlight Over Elsweyr - M.E.O.W Skooma
 - Redwater Skooma
 - Vampire's Kiss Skooma
 - Fly Amarita (Drinkable Version)
 - Fly Amarita (Smokable Version)
 - Vodka[/color]
[/size][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc][size=4]Each of this narcotics has its effects which are realistic,what means that Classical Skooma effects lasts for 5 mins and 
has very strong effect as side effects.

With unique recipes and one new ingridient :
Make wine from exclusive Vittis Grapes that grows in your little vineyard.
(Sorry for the amateur look of vineyard,I did mine best at improvisation,since I wanted to make it "Tamrielic")[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=4][i]Some example of recipes in this mod :
 - M.E.O.W : Taproot,2x Potions Of Stamina
 - Redwater Skooma : Creep Cluster,Potion Of Stamina,Moonsugar
 - Fly Amarita ( Alcohol Ver.) : Fly Amarita,Potion Of Health,Potion Of Stamina
 - Mead : Honey,Health Potion.

Some Example Of Effects :
 - Skooma : Fortifies stamina for 150 pts for 5min,ravages magicka for 5min and restores all stamina.
 - Redwater Skooma :Restores all stamina,but increased weakness to magic for 5 min.
 - Fly Amarita ( Alcohol Ver.) : Restores small ammount of health and cures poison
 - Mead : restores 70 pts of stamina but damages stamina reg for 30 sec by 30pts.
[/i][/size][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#cccccc][size=4]Also modifies the prices,now alcohol and narcotics are little bit more expensive.
Also Added A New Perk To Alchemist : Hyper Production (Create six potions from single recipe ingridents,excluding narcotics.)


I strongly suggest that you also download mine mod,[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87605]Black Market[/url],since there is an vendor who sells large ammounts of Moon Sugar.
[/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4][color=#cccccc]

[u][b][i]Credits :[/i]
[/b][/u][/color][i][b]Aars,CCOR,Core,Elianora,Insanity,Oaristys,K13ran64,LoR,Strotti,T67,Runs,LoliceptResource,Lazz[/b][/i]
[/size][/font][b][u][size=5]
[/size][/u][/b]
author: ibrica_orahovac
